Review of unprocessed claims to determine eligibility, payment, and patient liability.
Client is providing training to JMS, or vice versa.
JMS is providing consulting services to the client.
Review of processed claims to see if benefit determination was made in accordance to plan guidelines.
Courtesy meeting with client for support on specific project.
Discussion about workflow, exploration of services, expectations, turn around time, interpretation. Pre-kick off meeting, Kick-off meetings. Bi-weekly domestic meeting.
Any plan building activity.  Includes creating codes, adding benefits, and plan changes, when billable.

Client requests new plan.  Client requests a new benefit to be added to an existing plan.  Client requests a new version of a plan with a change in benefits (higher deductible for example).  Corrections made due to plan interpretation are billable.
Mapping logic specific to a group or plan.
Mapping logic that is universal to the platform.
Activities which are generally considered to be outside of the scope of standard plan building such as PPO and fee schedules, eligibility, banking/accounting, auto-adjudication
Creating and adjudicating test claims under a specific plan.
Review of Plan Test results, comparision with plan documents to see if benefits are paying correctly.
Services typically outside plan building.  May apply system wide.
Example: Dan's work, Team 3 work to set up system.  Proof of concept work.
Plan building activity to correct or adjust blantant error(s) on a plan built by JMS within the follow-up time period specified by the client contract.
Must have contract or rate.  Must be approved and evaluated by operations and sales
